review: This item was on my Christmas list for 2014 and it did NOT dissapoint! I'm very happy with the product and use it daily. Since setting it up the day after Christmas, I've only ran into 1 instance where I've had to reset it via the remote. I've found some really cool apps that have fitness videos as well as my normal apps like Hulu, Netflix, HBO, etc. A huge plus is the option to hook it up wired via an ethernet cord or wirelessly as well as the voice search (hasn't pulled up anything incorrect yet as most voice recognition services do because of my accent!). Also, the prime eligible videos (movies and series) are the absolute best part! Overall, I'm super happy with the product.
